sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { Container, AppBar, Typography, Grow, Grid } from '@material-ui/core' import memories from './images/memories.png' import { getPosts } from './actions/posts' import Posts from './components/Posts/Posts' import Form from './components/Form/Form' import useStyles from './styles' const App = () => { const classes = useStyles() const dispatch = useDispatch() useEffect(() => { dispatch(getPosts()) }, [dispatch]) return ( Memories
) } export default App
